name: INFINITE CRIME$
description:
My submission for PROCJAM 2018, and also my first attempt at:

1. procedural generation

2. 3d Unity games

Some of the textures don't load in the web player but idk way so,, sorry????

INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

STEAL items for CRIME POINTS (dollars)

if u get pushed off the level by the cops, u lose!!!!!!!!

hit the reset button to start over! and generate another level! procedurally! WOW!

Made with the help of Devil's Garage's free 3d asset pack they provided for PROCJAM! Check it (and them) out!!! http://www.procjam.com/art/devil.html

Thanks for playing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :^)
